content: I was an Airline Trainer teaching various international groups of students to operate computer systems. Each time I came off for the day I would always think “that could have been better. One day my boss called me in and I thought I was in for a grilling. He said to me “ John you’re the best trainer we’ve ever had”! Our worst critics is ourself. Kind regards John March BSc/ Cert Ed. Deal, England U.K.
